article_title: Germany welcomes EU green light for Lufthansa bailout
article_text: BERLIN (Reuters) - Germany's economy and finance ministers on Thursday welcomed the approval by the European Union for a government bailout package for Lufthansa and urged shareholders to approve the deal at a meeting later in the day.In a joint statement, the two ministers welcomed the EU move, noting the bailout was essential to secure jobs."This concerns more than a hundred thousand jobs and Germany's position in world markets," Economy Minister Peter Almaier said.(Reporting by Emma Thomasson; Editing by Michelle Martin)
